instructions.sl.utf8: Pazljivo preberite vsako izjavo. Če se z izjavo strinjate, obkljukajte ustrezno polje.
instructions.en.utf8: Read each statement carefully. If you agree with the statement, than tick the appropriate checkbox.

question.sl.utf8: Znam se razumljivo izražati, tako da uporabljam naučene besedne zveze in posamezne izraze.
question.en.utf8: I can make myself understood using memorised phrases and single expressions.

question.sl.utf8: Skupine besed znam povezovati s preprostimi vezniki, kot so »in«, »ampak«, »ker«.
question.en.utf8: I can link groups of words with simple connectors like »and«, »but« and »because«.

question.sl.utf8: Znam pravilno uporabljati enostavne stavčne oblike.
question.en.utf8: I can use some simple structures correctly.

question.sl.utf8: Znano besedišče mi zadostuje v preprostih vsakdanjih okoliščinah.
question.en.utf8: I have a sufficient vocabulary for coping with simple everyday situations.

question.sl.utf8: Znam posredovati preproste, neposredno pomembne informacije in izraziti tisto, kar se mi zdi najpomembnejše.
question.en.utf8: I can convey simple information of immediate relevance, getting across which point I feel is most important.

question.sl.utf8: Moje besedišče je dovolj obširno, da se lahko pogovarjam o vsakdanjih temah, kot so družina, konjički, delo, potovanja in dnevni dogodki.
question.en.utf8: I have a sufficient vocabulary to express myself with some paraphrasing on most topics pertinent to my everyday life such as family, hobbies and interests, work, travel, and current events.

question.sl.utf8: V znanih predvidljivih okoliščinah se znam razumljivo in pravilno izražati.
question.en.utf8: I can express myself reasonably accurately in familiar, predictable situations.

question.sl.utf8: Govoriti in pisati znam dovolj dobro, da se sporazumem v vsakdanjem življenju.
question.en.utf8: I can talk and write well enough to communicate in everyday life.

question.sl.utf8: Tekoče in v enakomernem tempu znam govoriti dalj časa. Tudi če iščem pravo besedo ali stavčno zvezo, ne nastajajo daljši odmori.
question.en.utf8: I can produce stretches of language with a fairly even tempo; although I can be hesitant as I search for patterns and expressions, there are few noticeably long pauses.

question.sl.utf8: Natančno znam posredovati podrobne informacije.
question.en.utf8: I can pass on detailed information reliably.

question.sl.utf8: Moj besedni zaklad zadošča, da se lahko izražam na svojem interesnem področju, pa tudi o večini splošnih tem.
question.en.utf8: I have sufficient vocabulary to express myself on matters connected to my field on most general topics.

question.sl.utf8: Dokaj pravilno se znam sporazumevati in popraviti napake, če so pripeljale do nesporazuma.
question.en.utf8: I can communicate with reasonable accuracy and can correct mistakes if they have led to misunderstandings.

question.sl.utf8: Skoraj brez napora se znam tekoče in spontano izražati. Moje tekoče govorjenje lahko ovira le vsebinsko zelo zahtevna tematika.
question.en.utf8: I can express myself fluently and spontaneously, almost effortlessly. Only a conceptually difficult subject can hinder a natural, smooth flow of language.

question.sl.utf8: Znam oblikovati jezikovno jasen, tekoč, tehtno zgrajen govor, s katerim dokazujem, da znam pametno razvijati misli.
question.en.utf8: I can produce clear, smoothly-flowing, well-structured speech, showing control over ways of developing what I want to say in order to link both my ideas and my expression of them into coherent text.

question.sl.utf8: Imam bogato besedišče, to pa mi omogoča, da izraz, ki se ga trenutno ne spomnim ali ga ne poznam, nadomestim z opisom; redko sem v zadregi zaradi iskanja ustreznega izraza in večinoma nimam težav pri natančnem izražanju.
question.en.utf8: I have a good command of a broad vocabulary allowing gaps to be readily overcome by using paraphrasing; I rarely have to search obviously for expressions or compromise on saying exactly what I want to.

question.sl.utf8: Lahko se izražam slovnično pravilno, napake so redke in jih je težko opaziti.
question.en.utf8: I can consistently maintain a high degree of grammatical accuracy; errors are rare and difficult to spot.

question.sl.utf8: Izražam se naravno in zanesljivo, samo včasih moram na kratko razmisliti, da najdem pravo besedo.
question.en.utf8: I can express myself naturally and effortlessly; I only need to pause occasionally in order to select precisely the right words.

question.sl.utf8: Natančnejše pomenske odtenke znam precej zanesljivo izraziti z uporabo široke palete jezikovnih sredstev, s katerimi podkrepim ali omilim svoje izjave.
question.en.utf8: I can convey finer shades of meaning precisely by using, with reasonable accuracy, a wide range of expressions to qualify statements and pinpoint the extent to which something is the case.

question.sl.utf8: Dobro poznam pogovorne in idiomatske izraze. Pri tem se zavedam njihovih prikritih pomenov.
question.en.utf8: I have a good command of idiomatic expressions and colloquialisms with an awareness of implied meaning and meaning by association.

question.sl.utf8: Slovnično pravilno govorim tudi takrat, ko je moje izražanje zahtevnejše ali pa je moja pozornost usmerjena kam drugam.
question.en.utf8: I can consistently maintain grammatical control of complex language even when my attention is otherwise engaged.
